sections.title: Collegiate Arcanist (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Collegiate Arcanist class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Aura of Good (Ex) (Collegiate Arcanist)
sections.description: The collegiate arcanist radiates an aura of good as if she were a cleric of a level equal to her class level, detectable by detect good spells.

sections.title: Halcyon Magic (Su) (Collegiate Arcanist)
sections.description: At each class level, the collegiate arcanist chooses a druid spell at least 2 levels lower than her highest castable spell level and adds it to one of her arcane spell lists as an arcane spell.

sections.title: Superior Spell Mastery (Ex) (Collegiate Arcanist)
sections.description: By studying for 24 hours over 3 days, the collegiate arcanist can change which spells she has mastered with the Spell Mastery feat.

sections.title: Virtuous Spells (Su) (Collegiate Arcanist)
sections.description: The collegiate arcanist casts good descriptor spells at +1 caster level but must use two spell slots to prepare evil descriptor spells.

sections.title: Intoned Recollection (Ex) (Collegiate Arcanist)
sections.description: Through a ritual (1 minute at 3rd level, full-round action at 9th level), the collegiate arcanist can prepare spells into empty spell slots without resting, using her spellbook or Spell Mastery.

sections.title: Lasting Goodness (Su) (Collegiate Arcanist)
sections.description: All of the collegiate arcanist's good descriptor spells have their durations extended by a number of rounds equal to her class level.

sections.title: Spontaneous Spell Mastery (Ex) (Collegiate Arcanist)
sections.description: The collegiate arcanist can lose any prepared spell to spontaneously cast a spell of the same or lower level that she has mastered with Spell Mastery.

sections.title: Blessed Warding (Sp) (Collegiate Arcanist)
sections.description: The collegiate arcanist is under a constant protection from evil effect that can be reactivated as a swift action if dispelled.

sections.title: Immediate Spell Mastery (Sp) (Collegiate Arcanist)
sections.description: Once per day, the collegiate arcanist can cast any spell mastered with Spell Mastery without having prepared it, but cannot apply metamagic feats to it.

sections.title: Righteous Contravention (Su) (Collegiate Arcanist)
sections.description: The collegiate arcanist gains a +2 bonus on spell resistance checks and dispel checks against evil creatures, evil descriptor spells, and evil magic items.

sections.title: Holy Arcana (Ex) (Collegiate Arcanist)
sections.description: The collegiate arcanist adds all Good domain bonus spells to one of her arcane spellcasting class lists as arcane spells.

sections.title: Altruistic Guardian (Su) (Collegiate Arcanist)
sections.description: Once per day as an immediate action, the collegiate arcanist can redirect harmful spell effects from allies within 30 feet to herself, taking all damage and effects for them.

sections.title: Timeless Body (Ex) (Collegiate Arcanist)
sections.description: The collegiate arcanist no longer takes penalties for aging, functioning exactly like the druid ability of the same name.
